explains: v. 核实，查证；证明，证实
wordGroup: examine and verify 审核；审计

sentences.en: An external auditor will verify the accounts.
sentences.cn: 外部审计员将核实这些账目。

sentences.en: They now take extra steps to verify the creditworthiness of customers.
sentences.cn: 他们现在采取额外措施来验证客户的信用。

sentences.en: Inspectors were sent to visit nuclear sites and verify compliance with the treaty.
sentences.cn: 监察员被派去参观核址并核实条约的遵守情况。
